sub_title: Leader Global Clinical Operations, Inspiring and Transformational Leader, Business Coach, Kinesiologist, Entrepreneur
summary:
Seasoned senior leader in leading teams and operations in clinical development for biotech, medical devices and pharma. My personal drive is to impact Quality of Life of people, especially giving back life to patients as well inspiring people to live life to their full potential. 
I have a proven track record of driving growth, improving operational efficiency, and executing business transformations successfully. Recognized as an inspiring leader, I focus on building a culture of passion, trust and collaboration combined with personal ownership. It is fulfilling to see people and teams grow and develop. The team collaboration is crucial to be successful in your services. I lead the business operations with high focus on customer service delivery, strong teams, quality, financial control and efficiency and fostering technological innovations.
I graduated as Certified Business Coach; course by Evercoach / Mindvalley for entrepreneurs, leaders and coaches. One of my customers has doubled their monthly sales following one month of coaching.
In my spare time, I continue focusing on my own personal development, i.e., leadership, business coaching, kinesiology and artificial intelligence. As an engineer, I am excited to see technological developments in healthcare and the significant contribution to people’s life and well-being it offers. How fabulous would it be when pro-activity and prevention becomes routine practice in how everyone nurtures their health - mind, body and soul - as well when diseases can be cured fully.

profile_positions.description:
Global Head of Clinical Operations, Global Study Start-up, Feasibility, Patient recruitment / engagement, and country clinical operations; >400 HC.
- Member of the Allucent Integration Management Team to merge CATO SMS and PharmaOlam during 2022 
- Establishing EU country CRA footprint and implementing CRA Academy within 6 months
- Leading and guiding cross-functional global teams by creating a positive inspiring team spirit with clear goals and expectations resulting in operational efficiency and engagement
- (Executive) sponsor for innovations and process optimizations
- Business Development support
- Executive representative at governance meetings

profile_positions.description: Global head of the Site Management team (Clinical Trial Leaders and CRAs) and the Clinical Trial Support Team (clinical trial assistants supporting the project teams).

profile_positions.description:
-	Global project director / lead transitioning full service project into FSP contracting model while securing business continuity and client satisfaction
-      Global and regional client alliance management including leading governance meetings, performance against metrics, pro-active risk management, and client satisfaction assessments
-	Leading and directing cross-functional teams while achieving interim and final contractual deliverables, according to timelines, quality, scope, budget and client satisfaction
-	Business development for global / regional / local strategic outsourcing for clinical trials including writing business proposals, contact negotiations, pricing strategies, development of various FSP business models, financial management, and vendor management
-	Mentorship and coaching of colleagues across the globe
-	Global and regional FSP Clinical Operations lead including leading process improvement strategies, risk management strategies, quality initiatives, global training programs, six sigma projects, and staff engagement initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Director, Flexible Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Management of new client to Covance in clinical FSP outsourcing starting in 2008 and developed towards a multi-million global and successfull business collaboration involving 5 regional leads and 60 country managers. Focus of the services were site management, monitoring and project management.

Successful collaboration with the other preferred client vendors to harmonize strategy and achieve successfull cooperation as well developed and implemented a new more advanced FSP client business model in 2014.
 
Global key stakeholder management to ensure global consistency, drive strategies to meet service obligations and delivering successful results to client.

Contract and financial management to secure profitability and meeting service obligations

Line manager of managers and operational teams in EMEA region 

FS department process improvement initiatives, FS  representative on Covance global CRA training program, six sigma projects for recruitment and contracting
profile_positions.title: Associate Director, Flexible Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Key client account manager for Europe / EMEA region and development to global account

Global management of client training program (2008 – 2010).

Management of various clients and Covance teams in multiple countries in EMEA region resulting in duplication of the business in Scandinavia in one year, double digit growth year on year in Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Portugal, S-Africa, and Israel.

Financial and contract management (global, regional, local)
Vendor set-up and management
Line management of project managers, CRAs and CPAs

profile_positions.description:
Project manager for EU / EMEA part of phase III clinical trial for new series of pacemakers which was completed in time and resulted in market release. 
Subsequently responsible for quality of clinical operations across 6 departments for the EU / EMEA region through in-house and on site audits, managing FDA inspections, client satisfaction program, maintaining the clinical quality management system, and global collaboration within QA department.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Study Manager / Clinical Quality Systems Specialist
